divs: sighting detailson 9\24\13 and about 9:30 pm, i was driving on highway 101 south, chehalis washington, on a rainy and foggy night when i saw a big circular red orange object flying sideways over a mountain, and bright everything like a sunshine on a summer time for just seconds, i keep driving on the highway and try to see if we can see more but we couldn't because everything turns more dark and the weather gets worse, but barely we saw the red orange clouds covering the big circular bright red orange object.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Chehalis
There were 2 other sightings in Chehalis on or around September 24th 2013
